sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import styled from 'styled-components'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { FiArrowRight, FiShoppingBag, FiList, FiShoppingCart, FiUsers, FiPlusCircle, FiLogIn, FiUserPlus } from 'react-icons/fi'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import AnimatedBackground from '../components/AnimatedBackground'; // Images import hamburgerImg from '../assets/images/Hamburger.jpg'; import pizzaSliceImg from '../assets/images/Pizza Slice.jpg'; import pastaImg from '../assets/images/Pasta.jpg'; import caesarSaladImg from '../assets/images/Caesar Salad.jpg'; import chocolateCakeImg from '../assets/images/Chocolate Cake.jpg'; // Main HomePage component const HomePage = () => { const { isAuthenticated, currentUser, isSeller, isCustomer } = useAuth(); return ( {isAuthenticated ? `Welcome back, ${currentUser?.name || 'User'}!` : 'Welcome to WildEats Online Canteen'} {isAuthenticated ? isSeller ? 'Manage your shop and fulfill orders' : 'Your one-stop solution for campus dining' : 'Your one-stop solution for campus dining'} {isAuthenticated ? isSeller ? 'Manage your shop, add food items, and process customer orders all in one place.' : 'Browse shops, place orders, and enjoy delicious meals from your favorite campus eateries.' : 'Log in to browse shops, place orders, and enjoy delicious meals from your favorite campus eateries.'} {isAuthenticated ? (isSeller ? 'Manage My Shop' : 'Explore Shops') : 'Log In'} {isAuthenticated ? 'Quick Actions' : 'Get Started'} {!isAuthenticated ? ( <> Log In Access your account to place orders and view history Register Create a new account to start using WildEats ) : isSeller ? ( <> My Shop Manage your shop details and food items Incoming Orders View and process customer orders ) : ( <> Browse Shops Explore all available canteen shops and their offerings View Orders Check the status of your current and past orders Place Order Quickly place a new order from your favorite shops )} Ready to Order? Explore our menu and place your order now for a delightful dining experience. Place an Order Management Features Shop Management Add, edit, and manage shops in the online canteen system. User Management Manage user accounts, permissions, and profiles. ); }; // Styled-components below (keep all original styles) const Container = styled.div`max-width:100%;overflow-x:hidden;position:relative;z-index:1;`; const HeroSection = styled.section`...`; // Keep your original styles for brevity const HeroContent = styled.div`...`; // Keep all other styled components as in your original file... export default HomePage;
